import React, {Component, useRef} from 'react' import AppBar from '@material-ui/core/AppBar' import MyToolbar from './myToolbar' import MenuButton from './menuButton' import AdminButton from './adminButton' import Scene from './scene' const outerStyleL = { width:"50%",display:"inline-block",position:"relative",left:"0" } const outerStyleR = { width:"50%",display:"inline-block",position:"relative",right:"0" } const innerStyleL = {display:"flex", justifyContent:"flex-start"} const innerStyleR = {display:"flex", justifyContent:"flex-end"} export const Menu = () => { const sceneEl = React.createRef() const handleClick = () => { console.dir(sceneEl.current) sceneEl.current.style.display === "none" ? sceneEl.current.setStyle({display:"block"}) : sceneEl.current.setStyle({display:"none"}) } return ( <>

Galerie Sens

 ) } export default Menu
